ygData.subject: Re: Possible SPOILER [WAS: Warrior wpns and Shields
ygData.msgSnippet: Painbringer is 7 / 23 and casts word of pain.  26 damage Area Affect Spell. This is found off Kobold Champion in Solusek B ... From: Mifsud, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
Painbringer is 7 / 23 and casts word of pain. 26 damage Area Affect Spell.
This is found off Kobold Champion in Solusek B


----- Original Message -----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 6:55 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Possible SPOILER [WAS: Warrior wpns and Shields


> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Painbringer is a 1hslash warrior only weapon that has some good stats
(cant
> remember for sure, but something like 9/24) and randomly casts Pain which
> does 20 points of damage to all enemy mobs. The beauty of this weapon is
> that you can have two! droooolss...
>
> The Shield of the Fallen Pegasus is a shield that acts as a piercing
weapon
> when use to bash, stats something like 10/30. Found in Nagafens lair.
>
> > ----------
